title: Diagnose Cell Tower Failure - Backhaul
description: A cell tower is online but not passing traffic. The agent suspects a backhaul link failure.

tasks.description: Ping the cell tower's management interface to confirm it is responsive.
tasks.expected_outcome: The ping is successful, indicating the tower has power and is running.

tasks.description: Check the status of the fiber backhaul link connected to the tower.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the backhaul link status is 'Down'.

tasks.description: Create a ticket for the fiber optics team to investigate the physical link.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a detailed ticket for the correct team.
